key.name: priority
key.summary: Priority to use for this plugin
key.description: Priority to use for this plugin in unity-settings-daemon startup queue

key.name: active
key.description: Whether this plugin would be activated by unity-settings-daemon or not

key.name: ignore-paths
key.description: Specify a list of mount paths to ignore when they run low on space.

key.name: free-percent-notify
key.description: Percentage free space threshold for initial warning of low disk space. If the percentage free space drops below this, a warning will be shown.

key.name: free-percent-notify-again
key.summary: Subsequent free space percentage notify threshold
key.description: Specify the percentage that the free disk space should reduce by before issuing a subsequent warning.

key.name: free-size-gb-no-notify
key.description: Specify an amount in GB. If the amount of free space is more than this, no warning will be shown.

key.name: min-notify-period
key.summary: Minimum notify period for repeated warnings
key.description: Specify a time in minutes. Subsequent warnings for a volume will not appear more often than this period.
